item.description:
We're going to be changing the Meetup location for this one. It'll be at Peter's Park in the South End off Washington Street. It is located directly across the street from 1244 Washington Street. The dog park is over near the tennis courts. It's a very popular park, so you should see a bunch of dogs running around.

Cancellation procedure: If it is raining, snowing or too cold, a cancellation notice will be sent via email and posted on the meetup website 2 hours prior to the meetup time.

Please note: Meetup.com charges each group a $19 a month meetup fee. This is a GROUP fee and if not paid, our Boston English Bulldog meetupâ€™s, would not exist.

The organizer is in charge of paying this fee every month. It would be greatly appreciated if at each meetup, each member can submit a donation that goes towards the monthly $19 fee. Give $1, give $10. If at the end of the meetup, the organizer has not collected enough to meet the $19, she will pay the difference. If she receives more than $19, the extra would go towards the next meetup.

Looking forward to seeing everyone there!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston French Bulldog January Meetup
